title: Lowly Creature - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Androids   Artificial Intelligence   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Futuristic Setting   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Power Couple   Programmer   Short Story   Smart Couple   Stoic Characters
author: Ka Bi Qiu   卡比丘
description:
The person who broke into his house looked exactly like his customized inflatable doll. It mainly tells the story of a human who doesn’t know how to fall in love and an artificial intelligence.

Human gong x robot shou>
